name: Create a new deal in HubSpot CRM from a LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms submission and notify to Slack
description:
Every time a new LinkedIn Lead Gen Forms lead is submitted, a new deal will be created in HubSpot and a confirmation message will be posted to Slack.

The template assumes your LinkedIn form collects these details:
1) First name
2) Last name
3) Phone
4) Email
5) Company name
